item.description:
Join us for a swim at Walden Pond. $5.00 for parking (Cash, machine takes $5's & $10's. but not $20s). Wetsuits recommended but I've seen people swimming without them as well, might be a little chilly. The plan is to swim across & back (~1mile roundtrip). Swim shorter or longer as you please.
Hope to see you there!
item.how_to_find_us: Meet in front of the bathrooms down at the beach
item.name: Swim The Great Walden Pond
